name: ETHAssetHolder
description: Ther ETHAssetHolder contract extends the AssetHolder contract, and adds the following functionality: it allows ETH to be escrowed against a state channelId and to be transferred to external destinations.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.description: amount of tokens purchased.

parameterDecorators.name: purchaser
parameterDecorators.description: who paid for the tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: value
parameterDecorators.description: weis paid for purchase.

functionDecorators.name: claim
functionDecorators.description: Transfers as many funds escrowed against `guarantorChannelId` as can be afforded for a specific destination in the beneficiaries of the __target__ of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract. Transfers as many funds escrowed against `guarantorChannelId` as can be afforded for a specific destination in the beneficiaries of the __target__ of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: guarantorChannelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for a guarantor state channel.

parameterDecorators.name: guaranteeBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of Outcome.Guarantee.

parameterDecorators.name: allocationBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of AssetOutcome.Allocation for the __target__.

parameterDecorators.name: destination
parameterDecorators.description: External destination or channel to transfer funds *to*.

functionDecorators.name: claimAll
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the funds escrowed against `guarantorChannelId` to the beneficiaries of the __target__ of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract. Transfers the funds escrowed against `guarantorChannelId` to the beneficiaries of the __target__ of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: guarantorChannelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for a guarantor state channel.

parameterDecorators.name: guaranteeBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of Outcome.Guarantee.

parameterDecorators.name: allocationBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of AssetOutcome.Allocation for the __target__.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Deposit ETH against a given destination. Deposit ETH against a given destination.

parameterDecorators.name: destination
parameterDecorators.description: ChannelId to be credited.

parameterDecorators.name: expectedHeld
parameterDecorators.description: The number of wei the depositor believes are _already_ escrowed against the channelId.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The intended number of wei to be deposited.

functionDecorators.name: setAssetOutcomeHash
functionDecorators.description: Sets the given assetOutcomeHash for the given channelId in the assetOutcomeHashes storage mapping. Sets the given assetOutcomeHash for the given channelId in the assetOutcomeHashes storage mapping.

parameterDecorators.name: channelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for a state channel.

parameterDecorators.name: assetOutcomeHash
parameterDecorators.description: The keccak256 of the abi.encode of the Outcome.

functionDecorators.name: transfer
functionDecorators.description: Transfers as many funds escrowed against `channelId` as can be afforded for a specific destination. Assumes no repeated entries. Transfers as many funds escrowed against `channelId` as can be afforded for a specific destination. Assumes no repeated entries.

parameterDecorators.name: fromChannelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for state channel to transfer funds *from*.

parameterDecorators.name: allocationBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of AssetOutcome.Allocation.

parameterDecorators.name: indices
parameterDecorators.description: Array with each entry denoting the index of a destination to transfer funds to.

functionDecorators.name: transferAll
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the funds escrowed against `channelId` to the beneficiaries of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract. Transfers the funds escrowed against `channelId` and transfers them to the beneficiaries of that channel. Checks against the storage in this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: channelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for a state channel.

parameterDecorators.name: allocationBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of AssetOutcome.Allocation.

functionDecorators.name: transferAllAdjudicatorOnly
functionDecorators.description: Transfers the funds escrowed against `channelId` to the beneficiaries of that channel. No checks performed against storage in this contract. Permissioned. Transfers the funds escrowed against `channelId` and transfers them to the beneficiaries of that channel. No checks performed against storage in this contract. Permissioned.

parameterDecorators.name: channelId
parameterDecorators.description: Unique identifier for a state channel.

parameterDecorators.name: allocationBytes
parameterDecorators.description: The abi.encode of AssetOutcome.Allocation.
